author: Ben Shapiro
title: Why more Americans will turn away from the media

author: Ben Shapiro
description:
BAU, Artist at War, opens only in theaters, for a limited run beginning September 26th. Go to https://BAUmovie.com to watch the trailer, read about Josef’s real-life journey, and find showtimes near you.

Ben explains why most conspiracy theories collapse under scrutiny; Justin Trudeau’s alleged Castro connection gets a closer look; and Sydney Sweeney’s jeans ad turns into the latest front in the culture war. Plus, Ben recalls his run-in with trans activists on Surrounded and breaks down why conspiracy theories aren’t just silly—they’re corrosive to America.

Watch the full episode: https://youtu.be/DAuAHSyenG0

title: Which Conspiracy Wins?
